content.title: Mapping the Recipients
content.body:
1. From the left pane of the mapping editor, expand Forms > frmAddRecipient.
  2. From the right pane of the mapping editor, expand Services > RecipientStorage$Recipients$create.
  3. Map the following widgets from the left pane to the service parameters on the right pane:
    • From the left pane expand TextField - tbxFirstName and select text {string}.
      From the right pane select FirstName {string}.
